::Hot Rod::

Hot Rod continued to walk quietly. He was trying to waver there
attention from the Ark, when he said that there was nobody there.
The more he thought, the more he felt stupid. He was surprized, he would
have never made that mistake, if he had a Matrix. All this made him wish
the Maximal Matrix within him, would refill, and he would become Rodimus
Prime. At least he had enough smarts to be a warrior then.
He then decided to take action. He walked in front of the Bount Hunters,
pointing his plasma guns at them.
"You're not going any farther, without meeting you're maker."
